name: Affine ultraETHs 2.0
description: Affine ultraETHs is the first L2 native symbiotic liquid restaking tokens, offering easy way for users to restake and delegate to symbiotic networks and AVSs. This also allows users to move ETH denominated values across many L2 chains near instantly, use that to do defi, while earning extra yields and incentives from staking and restaking. Affine LRTs are secured by Affine risk engine which came out of our research and collaboration with industry leading researchers and AVSs. This will enable ultraETHs to be secured from slashing risks.
